---
title: "Sampling"
date: 2023-10-30

## Readings 

- MD Ch 7



## Data

- Install the `infer` package to follow along:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("infer")
```
:::


- Reinstall the Gov 50 data package that has new data for this week:

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
remotes::install_github("mattblackwell/gov50data")
```
:::


- CSV files for the data from this week if you cannot install the package:
  - [`gov50_class_years.csv`](/files/data/gov50_class_years.csv)
